dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will carefully weigh the pros and cons before making a decision, avoiding unnecessary risks.
Your FarTwin will eagerly take on new challenges and risks, seeking excitement and opportunities for growth.

dimensions.label: Financial Priorities
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach managing money?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize saving and investing, focusing on long-term financial stability.
Your FarTwin will enjoy spending money on luxuries and experiences, valuing their happiness and freedom.

dimensions.label: Social Comfort Zone
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with large groups?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer smaller, more intimate settings and may struggle to connect with strangers.
Your FarTwin will thrive in social situations, enjoying the energy and interaction of large groups.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new knowledge?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through images, videos, and hands-on experiences.
Your FarTwin will prefer to learn through lectures, discussions, and oral instructions.

dimensions.label: Physical Activity
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach exercise?

options.description: Your FarTwin will enjoy regular physical activity, seeing it as a way to improve health and mood.
Your FarTwin may struggle with motivation or find exercise too time-consuming or uncomfortable.

dimensions.label: Humor Sense
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin respond to humor?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use sarcasm and irony to navigate social situations and express themselves.
Your FarTwin will respond with heartfelt, authentic laughter and a willingness to connect with others through humor.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle disagreements?

options.description: Your FarTwin may become heated and confrontational when dealing with conflicts, prioritizing their own perspective.
Your FarTwin will strive to find common ground, listening actively and working together to resolve issues.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin showcase their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will express themselves through immersive, multisensory experiences and interactive art.
Your FarTwin will engage in abstract, intellectually stimulating creative pursuits, such as writing or puzzle-solving.
